name: 1 ½ lbs. Stew meat
instructions: Soak meat 1-3 hours.  (beef does not have to be soaked, if preferred)
Brown meat in 2 tbsp. Vegetable  Oil and dust with flour
While cooking, add stew mix, brown gravy, onion, garlic, bay leaf and water
Cut up veggies and mushrooms and add to pot
Simmer ½ hour more or until meat and veggies are soft
Gravy may need to be thickened with flour & water

warnings: 1 ½ lbs. Stew meat: Missing ingredients
